item.title: raising fish in my college basement
item.description: While in my last year of university, I became obsessed with the idea of having my own micro aquaponics ecosystem. Then, in a moment of weakness, I bought fifteen tilapa fry on eBay. The Beginning I was introduced to aquaponics by my neighbor, Jed. Aquaponics fascinated me because it you can think of it as a miniature ecosystem, complete with its own nutrient cycle. To those unfamiliar, an aquaponics system combines two high-density farming techniques: aquaculture and hydroponics.
